Summary: A brightly lite object that has been in the same place..moves very little in a weeks time.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Belpre
There was one other sighting in Belpre on or around October 19th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsred,blue,green,white, blinking lights...maybe a satalight, definatly not a plane or helicopter.been watching it for a week or so. first noticed it while taking pictures of the moon in my front yard. someone please tell me what im seeing if possible..you may be able to see it from where you are now if its dark out
